_comment: Crypto Options — Variance Risk Premium (VRP) Strategy Backtest
_description: Short variance premium: IV_atm - RV_realized. When IV >> RV, sell options (short vol).

data._note: Synthetic IV = RV + calibrated VRP. Use real IV when Deribit API history available.

costs._note: Deribit options fees: 3 bps maker, 5 bps taker (on underlying notional)

strategy.name: crypto_vrp

params._exit_z_note: Phase sweep: exit_z=-3.0 >> -2.0 >> -1.5. Pure carry = never exit. Overlays destroy Sharpe.
params._lookback_note: Shorter lookback (30 vs 60) marginally better. Mostly irrelevant since exit never triggers.
params._rebalance_note: Weekly rebalance for 1d bars. Daily rebalancing (freq=1) destroys Sharpe via costs.

strategy._sweep_insight: 320-combo sweep: exit_z=-3.0 always wins. VRP is pure carry — timing exits reduces carry income. Overlays (z-scaling, IV pct, vol regime) ALL destroy Sharpe.
